headline: Eversource Energy Declares Common Dividend
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, January 29, 2025--The Board of Trustees of Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) today approved a quarterly dividend of $0.7525 per share, payable on March 31, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 4, 2025.

headline: Eversource breaks ground on US Greater Cambridge Energy Program
summary: The company aims to launch GCEP in 2029, with full energisation of transmission lines by 2031.
